XMVP.Story: { "title": "The Homecoming at No. 40", "synopsis": "A group of 6 people in a room, avoiding the truth.", "characters": [ "Stanley (The Tenant) [Male] {Oliver Reed at age 65}", "Meg (The Wife) [Male] {Peter O'Toole at age 45}", "Goldberg (The Visitor) [Male] {Montgomery Clift at age 45}", "Arthur (The Caretaker) [Female] {Bette Davis at age 35}", "Iris (The Sister) [Female] {Judy Garland at age 45}", "Bernard (The Associate) [Female] {Marilyn Monroe at age 55}" ], "theme": "Hero's Journey" }
